description:
Now 12, Well joins the Adventurers` Academy, but as the only scholarship student for magic he finds himself alone and set apart from the rest. Meanwhile, Erwin, Iina, and Louise all join forces to try and get Well to join their party. Hoping to earn Well`s approval, they sneak into the hunting grounds where big game resides, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Loner? Are You Kidding Me?!
Encore tout seul ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
ボッチって, それはないでしょう!
